ai:cl.c: Simplifies the management of date/time information.

ai:a.c: Updates the values in a time object with the current system date and time.

ai:m.c: Apply the time to the system clock.

ai:f.c: Day of week (0 - 6) starting from Sunday.
A microsecond is one millionth of a second (0 - 999999)
A millisecond is one thousandth of a second (0 - 999)
Represents the system time when the time object was last queried.
Read this field to get representation of the time as a single integer.
